column4: hey all.. i hate to ask this question on here, i know i am in the wrong spot for it... but i have two computers, this one on ubuntu, and the other one wich is a windows system... does anybody know how to stop things from automatically coming on when the computer starts... i used to know, but its been a while since i have used it
yeah the programs that automatically start, like aim and msn and stuff on windows
xp also has services.  you can start the service manager and change the status to manual
